description:
Shindou Saeki is a prominent character in the story and part of http://anidb.net/ch64305 [Akira]`s entourage. She stubborn and self-indulgent; tallest woman of the group. She also dates http://anidb.net/ch64306 [Chikami Yukari].
Soon after entering the mansion, she is brutally violated by http://anidb.net/ch60801 [Maya`s] henchmen. During the second episode, she is the only one who is able to escape from the mansion, but is psychologically disturbed by the experience.
She has purple eyes, widow`s peak, and long orange hair; part of her hair is kept in front, in addition, it`s decorated with burgundy sunglasses. Her fair skin is covered by a multi-colored striped strapless shirt and blue jean shorts.
name: Shindou Saeki
